Method Detail

getLog

Log getLog(long logId)
           throws LogNotFoundException
Retrieves the log.

Parameters:
roleId - the identifier of the log
Returns:
the role
Throws:
LogNotFoundException - If the log identifier does not refer to an existing log
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the role retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

getNumberOfLogs

int getNumberOfLogs()
Returns the total number of logs.

Returns:
the total number of logs
Throws:
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the count retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

getLogs

List<Log> getLogs(int startIndex,
                  int maxResults,
                  LogCriterion criterion)
Retrieves the paginated list of logs. It retrieves from the startIndex to the startIndex + maxResults.

Parameters:
startIndex - the start index
maxResults - the max number of logs
criterion - the sorting criterion
Returns:
the paginated list of logs
Throws:
RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the log retrieving
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0

searchLogs

SearchResult<Log> searchLogs(SearchOptions searchOptions)
                             throws SearchException
Searches logs according to the criteria containing in the options.

Parameters:
options - the search criteria
Returns:
the search result
Throws:
SearchException - If an exception occurs during the log searching
InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
Since:
6.0
